header.title: Shah Fahad
header.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
header.description: I develop software solutions to address real-world problems.

about.title: About Me
description: Full-stack developer with expertise in building scalable, high-performance web applications. Experienced in both frontend and backend development, including UI design, server-side logic, database integration, and API development. Passionate about writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code following industry best practices.

My journey into software development began in 2021, driven by a fascination with the potential of technology. I was drawn to the challenge of creating digital solutions and the prospect of working in a dynamic, ever-evolving field. Since then, I've dedicated myself to mastering the intricacies of coding and software environments.
This dedication has led me to develop multiple software solutions for diverse clients. I've gained hands-on experience in the full software development lifecycle, from initial concept to deployment.

My current focus is on developing full-stack applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). I prioritize adhering to professional software development practices to ensure that I deliver high-quality, robust solutions that meet and exceed client expectations.

While I spend a significant amount of time coding and problem-solving, I also value balance. When I step away from the computer, I find solace and inspiration in nature, appreciating the quiet moments of reflection.

experience.title: MERN Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed multiple full-stack applications using the MERN Stack. Collaborated with designers and stakeholders to build user-friendly and efficient systems. Designed and implemented scalable RESTful APIs for web applications. Improved code readability and maintainability by following best coding practices. Worked on internal business applications, including an electronic MIS with invoice & report management.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Developed eCommerce applications using PHP and MySQL. Managed server-side development and implemented design patterns. Delivered technical solutions based on stakeholder business requirements. Projects: ClickableShop, YMS LLC, GhuffiStore.

experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description: Developed two small Android applications using Java & SQLite. Built Text Encryptor & 2D Obstacle Game.

project.title: SCECO | E-commerce Platform
project.description: Developed a full-stack eCommerce platform for auto spare parts. Implemented Firebase storage & REST APIs using Express.js. Integrated authentication, CRUD operations, and Firebase storage. Integrated MongoDB with Mongoose for efficient data storage, products, and user management.

project.title: MIS for Electronic Business
project.description: Built a sales management system for an electronics business. Integrated Flask services & APRIORI Algorithm for demand forecasting. Designed Microservices architecture to manage sales, expenses, and reports. Integrated MongoDB with Mongoose for efficient data storage, inventory management.

project.title: 3BS | Marketplace for Used Items
project.description: Created a buy & sell platform for used items. Implemented Firebase storage & REST APIs using Express.js. Implemented JWT authentication, user sessions, and role-based access control. Integrated MongoDB with Mongoose for efficient data storage management.

project.title: Solar Scape
project.description: Developed a solar energy assessment tool. Integrated third-party APIs for real-time solar potential data. Designed a Microservices architecture for user & data management. Implemented JWT authentication, and Integrated MongoDB with Mongoose for efficient data storage management.

project.title: GoTree | CLI File and Directory Tree Viewer
project.description: Developed a command-line tool to display directory structures in a tree-like format. Implemented recursive file system traversal with Go’s os and filepath packages. Added customizable output options, including dynamic path and hidden file visibility. Packaged the application as a standalone binary for cross-platform support.
